startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front, feet together and hands besides the buttocks, or sit with a cross-legged pose. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Straighten the right arm in front of the body at the shoulder level.
Make a loose fist with the right hand, with the thumb inside and the fist faces downward.
Slowly rotate the fist making a large circle as possible from the wrist, clockwise 5 times, making sure the fist faces downward throughout the practice.
Slowly rotate the fist making a large circle as possible from the wrist, anti-clockwise 5 times, making sure the fist faces downward throughout the practice.
Straighten the left arm in front of the body at the shoulder level.
Make a loose fist with the left hand, with the thumb inside and the fist faces downward.
Slowly rotate the fist making a large circle as possible from the wrist, clockwise 5 times, making sure the fist faces downward throughout the practice.
Slowly rotate the fist making a large circle as possible from the wrist, anti-clockwise 5 times, making sure the fist faces downward throughout the practice.
Straighten both the arms in front of the body at the shoulder level.
Make a loose fist with both the hands, with the thumb inside and the fists faces downward.
Slowly rotate both the fist making a large circle as possible from the wrist, clockwise 5 times, making sure the fist faces downward throughout the practice.
Slowly rotate both the fist making a large circle as possible from the wrist, anti-clockwise 5 times, making sure the fist faces downward throughout the practice.
Straighten both the arms in front of the body at the shoulder level.
Make a loose fist with both the hands, with the thumb inside and the fists faces downward.

Slowly rotate both the fist making a large circle as possible from the wrist, in opposite direction (right hand fist clockwise, left hand anti-clockwise) 5 times, making sure the fist faces downward throughout the practice.

Slowly rotate both the fist making a large circle as possible from the wrist, in opposite direction (right hand fist anti-clockwise, left hand clockwise) 5 times, making sure the fist faces downward throughout the practice.

info: Rotate only the hands from the wrist, every other body part should be motionless.
Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
